Symbol.Script_3D:
hotspot 0,0,0,900
gs_detlevel_3D="" : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "gs_detlevel_3D", gs_detlevel_3D) if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then show_thread=0 bChamfer = 0 res = 5 else res = 36 endif call "Показ_болтов" PARAMETERS ALL ang1=rang, ang2=yRot_r, el_views=el_views RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_type, show_wash_list, show_hole
show = 0 call "Показ_по_сборкам" PARAMETERS ALL subpos=subpos, pos=GLOB_ID RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_subpos, show_marker show = show_subpos if not(show) then end
if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=1 or GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=2 or GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE=1 then res = 9 bChamfer=0 show_thread=0 else if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 then res = 19 else if res<3 then res=13 endif endif if iscall then goto 3001 show_res=res SHADOW OFF, OFF resol show_res material gs_ifc_mat pen gs_cont_pen
roty 90 ! Horizontal HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0.4*lenB, unID, yRot, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, yRot, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 1, 0, unID, yRot, 7: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0.4*lenB*sin(yRot),0,0.4*lenB*cos(yRot), unID, yRot, 5: unID=unID+1 roty yRot
if show_hole then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=coord_hole[2] else max_r=coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT max_r, 0,0, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, ang_hole, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 1, unID, ang_hole, 7: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT max_r*cos(ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(ang_hole)*0.6,0, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rotz ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[1], 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 endif HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[2], 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 endif if show_hole_axis and show_type = NOT_SHOW then if type_hole=1 then lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0 lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 endif if type_hole=2 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif if type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif endif del 1 endif
if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_SIDE and show_hole and show_res>9 then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=1 then cylind insideLength+0.001, holeSizeR endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 PUT coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,15 if type_hole=2 then PUT coord_hole[2],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 else PUT coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,15 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 prism_ NSP/3,insideLength+0.001,get(NSP) del 1 endif del 1 end endif
roty -90 call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL show_type=show_type, insideLength=insideLength, amg2d=amg2d del 1
if show_type = NOT_SHOW then HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9010 addx insideLength hotspot 0,0,0,9011 HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9012 del 1 end endif
if show_type<>SHOW_3D then end gosub 600 3001:
group "Nut" hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot 0,0,nut_thk put -nut_diam/2, -nut_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, -nut_diam/2, nut_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , nut_diam/(2*cos(30)), 15, nut_diam/2, nut_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, nut_diam/2, -nut_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , -nut_diam/(2*cos(30)), 15, -nut_diam/2, -nut_diam/2*tan(30) , -1,
0 , 0 , 900, ! smooth hole diaB/2, 0 , 79, diaB/2, 360-stepAng, 4000+79, diaB/2, 0 , -1 prism_ nsp/3, nut_thk, get(nsp) endgroup group "nChamfer" nRad = bolt_diam+0.01 nDia = nut_diam mulz -1 gosub 350 del 1 body -1 addz nut_thk gosub 350 del 1 endgroup group "Head" hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot 0,0,bolt_thk put -bolt_diam/2, -bolt_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, -bolt_diam/2, bolt_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , bolt_diam/(2*cos(30)), 15, bolt_diam/2, bolt_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, bolt_diam/2, -bolt_diam/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , -bolt_diam/(2*cos(30)), 15, -bolt_diam/2, -bolt_diam/2*tan(30) , -1 prism_ nsp/3, bolt_thk, get(nsp) endgroup group "hChamfer" mulz -1 nRad = bolt_diam+0.01 : nDia = bolt_diam : gosub 350 del 1 endgroup group "Wash1" hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot 0,0,wash1_thk prism_ 3, wash1_thk, 0 , 0 , 900+79, wash1_diam/2, 360, 4000+79, wash1_diam_in/2, 360, 4000+79 endgroup group "Wash2" hotspot 0,0,0 hotspot 0,0,wash2_thk hotspot wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,0 hotspot wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,wash2_thk hotspot -wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,0 hotspot -wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,wash2_thk hotspot -wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,0 hotspot -wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,wash2_thk hotspot wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,0 hotspot wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,wash2_thk if wash2_type="Прямоугольная" then prism_ 4, wash2_thk, wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,15, -wash2_a/2,wash2_b/2,15, -wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,15, wash2_a/2,-wash2_b/2,15 endif if wash2_type="Круглая" then prism_ 3, wash2_thk, 0 , 0 , 900+79, wash2_diam/2, 360, 4000+79, wash2_diam_in/2, 360, 4000+79 endif endgroup
IF show_bolt gosub 100 ! Bolt if not(is_stud) then gosub 300 ! Bolt Head if (qty_nut_start + qty_nut_end)>0 then gosub 400 ! Nut if wash_thk>EPS then gosub 500 ! Washers
killgroup "Head" killgroup "Nut" killgroup "hChamfer" killgroup "Wash1" killgroup "Wash2" killgroup "nChamfer" end ! -------------------------------------------
100 : !!! ========== Bolt ========== if abs(lenB-hit)> EPS then cylind lenB-hit, diaB/2 endif addz lenB-hit IF not(show_thread)THEN bolt_tpi=0 cylind hit, diaB/2 - bolt_tpi del 1 IF show_thread THEN gosub 200 ! Thread return
200 : !!! ========== Thread ========== if req ("GDL_version") >= 1.564 then bAC12 = 1 ! >= AC12 totAng = 360*hit/bolt_tpi + 360 ! total angle for k = -stepAng to totAng + stepAng + EPS step stepAng ! phantom points put bolt_body/2*cos(k), bolt_body/2*sin(k), bolt_tpi*k/360 next k addz lenB-hit cutplane 1, 1, 0, 1 ! start del 1 addz lenB cutplane 1, 1, 0, 0 ! end del 1 addz lenB - hit - bolt_tpi/2 if bAC12 then tubea 4, nsp/3, 1+2+16+32 + 128, ! reduce Polycount 0 , 0 , 0, bolt_tpi, bolt_tpi/2, 0, bolt_tpi, -bolt_tpi/2, 0, 0 , 0 , -1, get(nsp) else delta = atn((bolt_tpi/2)/bolt_tpi) xOff = EPS*cos(delta) ! additional points for rendering yOff = EPS*sin(delta) tubea 8, nsp/3, 1+2+16+32, 0 , 0 , 0, xOff , yOff , 1, ! rendering bolt_tpi-xOff, bolt_tpi/2-yOff, 1, ! rendering bolt_tpi , bolt_tpi/2 , 0, bolt_tpi , -bolt_tpi/2 , 0, bolt_tpi-xOff, -bolt_tpi/2+yOff, 1, ! rendering xOff , -yOff , 1, ! rendering 0 , 0 , -1, get(nsp) endif del 1 cutend cutend return
300 : !!! ========== Bolt Head ========== addz -bolt_thk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Head" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Head", "hChamfer") del 1 return
350 : !!! ========== Chamfer ========== if not(bChamfer) then return nutRad = abs(nRad) put 0 , nutRad , 2, nutRad-nDia/2, 0.96*nDia/2, 2, nutRad-nDia/2, nutRad , 2, 0 , nutRad , -1 roty -90 addx -(nutRad-nDia/2) revolve nsp/3, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, get(nsp) del 2 return
400 : !!! ========== Nut ========== if qty_nut_end>0 then addz nPos+wash_thk_end if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") if qty_nut_end>1 then rotz 90 addz nut_thk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") del 2 endif del 1 endif if qty_nut_start>0 then addz POS_2-nut_thk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") if qty_nut_start>1 then rotz 90 addz -nut_thk if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") del 2 endif del 1 endif return
500 : !!! ========== Washers 1 ========== if (qty_wash_end=1) or (qty_wash_end=2) then ADDZ nPos + wash2_thk*(qty_wash_end=2) placegroup "Wash1" DEL 1 endif if (qty_wash_start=1) or (qty_wash_start=2) then ADDZ POS_2*(is_stud=1) placegroup "Wash1" DEL 1 endif if (qty_wash_start=3) or (qty_wash_start=2) then addz POS_2*(is_stud=1) + wash1_thk*(qty_wash_start=2) if show_wash_list then placegroup "Wash2" DEL 1 endif if (qty_wash_end=3) or (qty_wash_end=2) then addz nPos if show_wash_list then placegroup "Wash2" DEL 1 endif return
600 : !!! ========== Hotspots ========== !!! ----- Length ----- hotspot 0, 0, 0 , unID, lenB, 1+256 : unID = unID+1 ! base hotspot 0, 0, -1 , unID, lenB, 3 : unID = unID+1 ! ref hotspot 0, 0, lenB, unID, lenB, 2 : unID = unID+1 ! moving !!! ----- Nut Position ----- hotspot 0, 0, 0 , unID, nPos, 1 : unID = unID+1 ! base hotspot 0, 0, -1 , unID, nPos, 3 : unID = unID+1 ! ref hotspot 0, 0, nPos, unID, nPos, 2 : unID = unID+1 ! moving !!! ----- Диаметр ----- addy -diaB/2 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unID, diaB, 1+128 : unID = unID+1 ! base hotspot 0, -1, 0, unID, diaB, 3 : unID = unID+1 ! ref hotspot 0, diaB, 0, unID, diaB, 2 : unID = unID+1 ! moving del 1 return
Symbol.Script_2D:
hotspot2 0,0,9001
gs_detlevel_3D="" : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "gs_detlevel_3D", gs_detlevel_3D) if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then show_thread=0 bChamfer = 0 res = 5 else res = 36 endif call "Показ_болтов" PARAMETERS ALL ang1=rang, ang2=yRot_r, el_views=el_views RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_type, show_wash_list, show_hole
show = 0 call "Показ_по_сборкам" PARAMETERS ALL subpos=subpos, pos=GLOB_ID RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_subpos, show_marker show = show_subpos if not(show) then end
! Резьбa DRAWINDEX 10 project2 3, 270, 2 if abs(yRot-180)<EPS then mul2 -1,1 if abs(yRot-270)<EPS then mul2 -1,1 LR=nPos+nut_thk_end+wash_thk_end if nPos>lenB - wash_thk_end - nut_thk_end then LR = lenB endif IF is_stud THEN LR3=POS_2+wash_thk_start LR4=LR3-nut_thk-wash1_thk if not(qty_nut_start) then LR3=POS_2+wash_thk_start LR4=LR3 endif ELSE IF thread="Complete" THEN LR3=0 ELSE LR3=lenB-hit ENDIF ENDIF if not(qty_nut_end) then LR=nPos+wash_thk_end
if (type_hole=2 or type_hole=3) and yRot_r_is_90 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=-coord_hole[2] else max_r=-coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT2 max_r, 0, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, ang_hole, 6+512*yRot_r_is_90: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 max_r*cos(-ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(-ang_hole)*0.6, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rot2 -ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[1], 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 endif HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[2], 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 endif
if show_hole then if yRot_r_is_90 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_3D then if type_hole=1 then circle2 0,0,holeSizeR HOTARC2 0, 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 hotspot2 0,holeSizeR,9006 hotspot2 0,-holeSizeR,9007 hotspot2 holeSizeR,0,9008 hotspot2 -holeSizeR,0,9009 endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 PUT -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,1 if type_hole=2 then PUT -coord_hole[2],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0,9010 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR,0,9011 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,9012 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,9013 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,9014 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,9015 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[2], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9006 else PUT -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,1 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 poly2_ NSP/3, 1+4,get(NSP) del 1 endif if show_hole_axis then if type_hole=1 then line2 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 endif if type_hole=2 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif if type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif endif endif if abs(yRot_r)<EPS then FILL FF ss = 0.0003 DRAWINDEX 20 !!! ЗАКРОЕМ ЛИНИИ POLY2_B 4, 7,FP,BGP, strart_hole+ss, -holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+insideLength-ss, -holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+insideLength-ss, holeSizeR, 0, strart_hole+ss, holeSizeR, 0 endif endif
! Hex Bolt Metric bCond = abs(yRot_r) < EPS if not(bCond) then end gosub 100 ! Hotspots if show_type<>SHOW_3D then end
IF W_axis THEN !!! ДЕЛАМ ОСЬ+++ LINE_TYPE LT PEN FP IF W_axis THEN LINE2 -wid,0, lenB+wid,0 ENDIF LINE_TYPE 1 PEN gs_cont_pen
!!! ДЕЛАМ БОЛТ - ПОКАЗ РЕЗЬБЫ+++ !IF show_hole2D THEN ! Line2 LR3,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi, LR2,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi ! Line2 LR3, diaB/2-bolt_tpi, LR2, diaB/2-bolt_tpi !ENDIF
if nPos<lenB - wash_thk_end - nut_thk_end then Line2 LR,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi, lenB+bolt_tpi,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi Line2 LR, diaB/2-bolt_tpi, lenB+bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi Line2 lenB,-diaB/2, lenB+bolt_tpi,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi Line2 lenB, diaB/2, lenB+bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi Line2 lenB+bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi, lenB+bolt_tpi, -diaB/2+bolt_tpi endif !!! ДЕЛАМ ШПИЛЬКУ IF is_stud THEN Line2 LR4,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi, -bolt_tpi,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi Line2 LR4, diaB/2-bolt_tpi, -bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi Line2 0,-diaB/2, -bolt_tpi,-diaB/2+bolt_tpi Line2 0, diaB/2, -bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi Line2 -bolt_tpi, diaB/2-bolt_tpi, -bolt_tpi, -diaB/2+bolt_tpi ENDIF
end ! -------------------------------------------
100 : !!! ========== Hotspots ========== !!! ----- Length ----- hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, lenB, 1+256 : uid = uid+1 ! base (anchor) hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, lenB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 lenB, 0, uid, lenB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
!!! ----- Nut Position -----
hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, nPos, 1 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, nPos, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 nPos, 0, uid, nPos, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
hotspot2 wash_thk_start,0 hotspot2 wash_thk_end+nPos,0
IF is_stud THEN !!! ШПИЛЬКА ADD2 wash_thk_start,0 hotspot2 0 , 0, uid, POS_2, 1 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1 , 0, uid, POS_2, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 POS_2, 0, uid, POS_2, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving DEL 1
!!!+++++ ЗАЗОР М/У ГАЙКАМИ +++++ ADD2 wash_thk+POS_2,0
hotspot2 0, DIAB, uid, LZ, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 -1, 0, uid, LZ, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 LZ, DIAB, uid, LZ, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving
DEL 1
ENDIF
!!! ----- Диаметр / Типоразмер ----- add2 0, -diaB/2 hotspot2 0, 0, uid, diaB, 1+128 : uid = uid+1 ! base hotspot2 0, -1, uid, diaB, 3 : uid = uid+1 ! ref hotspot2 0, diaB, uid, diaB, 2 : uid = uid+1 ! moving del 1 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.0001 unID = 1 NOT_SET = -1 NOT_SHOW = 0 SHOW_3D = 1 SHOW_TOP = 2 SHOW_SIDE = 3
StandingB = 1 TemporaryB = 2 HstrengthB = 3 ChimanchorB = 4 ManchorB = 5 FoundB = 6
yRot_r = abs(yRot) MOD 180 yRot_r_is_90 = abs(yRot_r-90)<EPS if yRot_r_is_90 then rang = 0 else rang = abs(SYMB_ROTANGLE-180*SYMB_MIRRORED) MOD 360 endif
EPS = 0.0001 res = min (max (12, res), 72) ! resolution stepAng = 360/res ! step angle uid = 1 ! hotspots zas_axis=0.01 LX = lenB - (lenB - nPos + wash1_thk + 0.0005)
wash_thk_start=wash1_thk*((qty_wash_start=1) or (qty_wash_start=2))+wash2_thk*((qty_wash_start=3) or (qty_wash_start=2)) wash_thk_end=wash1_thk*((qty_wash_end=1) or (qty_wash_end=2))+wash2_thk*((qty_wash_end=3) or (qty_wash_end=2)) wash_thk = wash_thk_start+wash_thk_end
nut_thk_start=nut_thk*qty_nut_start nut_thk_end=nut_thk*qty_nut_end
holeSizeR = (bolt_body/2)+holeTolerance IF is_stud THEN strart_hole=POS_2+wash_thk_start insideLength = nPos - POS_2 - wash_thk_start ELSE insideLength = nPos - wash_thk_start strart_hole=wash_thk_start ENDIF PARAMETERS insideLength = insideLength, strart_hole=strart_hole
Symbol.Script_UI:
UI_outFIELD "Угол-1 (в плоскости)", 0, 110, 130, 15 UI_outFIELD rang, 30, 130, 100, 15 UI_outFIELD "Угол-2 (из плоскости)", 0, 150, 130, 15 UI_outFIELD yRot_r, 30, 170, 100, 15
UI_outFIELD "Скрыть в виде", 0, 190, 90, 15 ui_infield "el_views", 0, 210, 130, 15
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Hex Bolt Metric PARAMETERS ang2 = yRot_r call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL IF not(is_stud) THEN HIDEPARAMETER "POS_2","LZ" PARAMETERS POS_2 = 0 endif
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="POS_2" THEN PARAMETERS LZ = nPos - POS_2 - wash_thk IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="nPos" THEN PARAMETERS LZ = nPos - POS_2 - wash_thk IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="LZ" THEN PARAMETERS nPos = LZ + POS_2 + wash_thk
values "nPos" range [wash_thk_start, lenB - wash_thk_end - 2*nut_thk_end/3] values "POS_2" RANGE [nut_thk_start,LX] end
Symbol.Comment: #http://pagesperso-orange.fr/archilib.od/ Hex Bolt Metric (Hex head bolt, from phubbell, AC Talk) Olivier Dentan : metric adaptation Sept 2010
